translations.text: By the heaven and the nightly star!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wassama-i wattariq
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: And what will make you realize what the nightly star is?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wama adraka ma attariq
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: ˹It is˺ the star of piercing brightness.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Annajmu aththaqib
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِن كُلُّ نَفْسٍ لَّمَّا عَلَيْهَا حَافِظٌ

translations.text: There is no soul without a vigilant angel ˹recording everything˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: In kullu nafsin lamma AAalayha hafith
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Let people then consider what they were created from!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Falyanthuri al-insanumimma khuliq
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: ˹They were˺ created from a spurting fluid,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Khuliqa min ma-in dafiq
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: stemming from between the backbone and the ribcage.<sup foot_note=77611>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Yakhruju min bayni assulbi wattara-ib
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Surely He is fully capable of bringing them back ˹to life˺
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Innahu AAala rajAAihi laqadir
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: on the Day all secrets will be disclosed.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Yawma tubla assara-ir
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَمَا لَهُۥ مِن قُوَّةٍ وَلَا نَاصِرٍ

translations.text: Then one will have neither power nor ˹any˺ helper.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fama lahu min quwwatin wala nasir
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: By the sky with its recurring cycles,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wassama-i thati arrajAA
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: and the earth with its sprouting plants!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wal-ardi thati assadAA
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Surely this ˹Quran˺ is a decisive word,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Innahu laqawlun fasl
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: and is not to be taken lightly.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wama huwa bilhazl
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: They are certainly devising ˹evil˺ plans,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Innahum yakeedoona kayda
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: but I too am planning.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waakeedu kayda
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: So bear with the disbelievers ˹O Prophet˺. Let them be for ˹just˺ a little while.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Famahhili alkafireena amhilhum ruwayda
translations.resource_name: Transliteration
